name: David
description: David is a rare Fukachu. This is a wise creature just don't make it angry.

name: Joey
description: Joey is a Cyborg Baby Kangaroo. This creature hops around and shoots his lasers randomly. Caution: Please do not stand in this pet's way.

name: Neill
description: The Neilla Monster is a relatively new species of Gila Monster. This evolution branch is able to breathe fire. Other than setting things ablaze, Neilla Monsters love making friends.

name: Peggy
description: Peggy the Pegasus is a magestic winged stallion. Having her around is sure to bring good fortune.

name: Gary
description: Goblin Gary will wake you up in the middle of the night from rummaging through the trash.

name: Phinny
description: Phoenix show great compassion and you don't need to worry about them dying!

name: Linda
description: Liger: It's pretty much my favorite animal. It's like a lion and a tiger mixed... bred for its skills in magic.

name: Little Guy
description: This dragon is in need of a permanent home, hopefully one with a big backyard.
